Layout1-Debtor_with_Header_and_Footer.text: Layout 1 - Debtor with Header and Footer

btmcontent.text:
* Use the current layout design to update an existing layout from the list below. Click the box next to the:
. Header,
. Footer
. CSS (Page Style)
Then click on the [Copy] button to update the selected layout.

help_step.name: tour_3
help_step.text: Checked the checkbox to add the header and footer in template layout.

help_step.name: tour_4
help_step.text: Click to add the header and footer layout content

help_step.name: tour_5
help_step.text: Enter the CSS styles in this box
